DOC.brief_summary: Nutrasorb newly develop food product ( see www.nutrasorb.com ) . This study use Nutrasorb soy protein product matrixed polyphenols blueberry green tea extract , test efficacy nutritional countermeasure exercise-induced physiologic stress ( i.e. , immune dysfunction , inflammation , oxidative stress ) use traditional metabolomics-based outcome measure .
DOC.criteria: Male female endurance athlete ; competitive runner cyclist Capable exercise 2.5 h high intensity lab Ages 1855 Agree train normally stay weight stable . Agree avoid use large dose vitamin/mineral supplement Agree avoid herb medication influence inflammation Regularly take supplement medicine know effect inflammation . At moderate high risk cardiovascular disease . Younger 18 old 55 year age . No history compete long distance run cycling race .
